Accessibility Resources

  • Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.2)

    This is the standard setting body (w3c) and the official recommendation that gets adopted by various organizations.

  • Section 508

    Section 508 of the rehabilitation act is where we get federal conformance regulation from.

  • ANDI (Accessible Name and Description Inspector)

    ANDI is a fnastastic tool for manual inspection of accessible names and properties of DOM elements.

  • Eric Eggert

    Eric is an outspoken a11y advocate and an excellent resource for technical accessibility information or disability inclusion.
